actions.name: CreateCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Private CA and its associated private key and configuration

actions.name: CreateCertificateAuthorityAuditReport
actions.description: Grants permission to create an audit report for an AWS Private CA

actions.name: CreatePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to create a permission for an AWS Private CA

actions.name: DeleteCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Private CA and its associated private key and configuration

actions.name: DeletePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a permission for an AWS Private CA

actions.name: DeletePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the policy for an AWS Private CA

actions.name: DescribeCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the configuration and status fields contained in the specified AWS Private CA

actions.name: DescribeCertificateAuthorityAuditReport
actions.description: Grants permission to return the status and information about an AWS Private CA audit report

actions.name: GetCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate authority specified by an ARN

actions.name: GetCertificateAuthorityCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate authority specified by an ARN

actions.name: GetCertificateAuthorityCsr
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS Private CA certificate signing request (CSR) for the certificate-authority specified by an ARN

actions.name: GetPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the policy on an AWS Private CA

actions.name: ImportCertificateAuthorityCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to import an SSL/TLS certificate into AWS Private CA for use as the CA certificate of an AWS Private CA

actions.name: IssueCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to issue an AWS Private CA certificate

actions.name: ListCertificateAuthorities
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the AWS Private CA certificate authority ARNs, and a summary of the status of each CA in the calling account

actions.name: ListPermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the permissions that have been applied to the AWS Private CA certificate authority

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags that have been applied to the AWS Private CA certificate authority

actions.name: PutPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to put a policy on an AWS Private CA

actions.name: RestoreCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to restore an AWS Private CA from the deleted state to the state it was in when deleted

actions.name: RevokeCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to revoke a certificate issued by an AWS Private CA

actions.name: TagCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to an AWS Private CA

actions.name: UntagCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from an AWS Private CA

actions.name: UpdateCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of an AWS Private CA
